attributes.action: Scrap the ID Card system in light of the HMRC data loss fiasco.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have no confidence in this Government or its agencies to protect private personal data from misuse or loss in light of the current and previous data security breaches by HMRC.  In view of this we call on the Government to scrap the introduction of the National Identity register and ID Card System

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
